suggest.meta_keywords: Managed Configurations, Azion Edge Infrastructure, Edge Application, Edge Functions, Digital Certificates, Real-Time Purge, Edge Firewall, Edge DNS, Edge Orchestrator, Configuration Management Service
suggest.meta_description: Explore Managed Configurations for controlling Azion Edge infrastructure, including Edge Applications, DNS settings, and Firewall policies. Ideal for Enterprise and Mission Critical plans.

current.meta_description: Managed Configurations employs the expertise of a team of experienced engineers to tackle certain day-to-day tasks on your behalf, such as configuring and maintaining your configurations.
